title: #1464 Surprise Surprise
itunes:title: #1464 Surprise Surprise
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show giving a quick recap of the recent Carolla Family BBQ before moving on to an update on the current state of Covid treatments that are available to the public. They also speak with some callers including a returning caller who decided not to take the vaccine after a previous call in but is now concerned about the variants and is looking for advice. The conversation then turns to the events of January 6th and the recent report by the FBI which found little to no evidence of organization therein. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:
BlindsGalore.com, tell them Adam sent you
ZipRecruiter.com/ADS
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
Pluto TV
